title: Why #Periodgate missed the mark
description:
To see Demetra Nyx's demonstration of self menstrual acceptance:
https://www.mirror.co.uk/news/weird-news/woman-covers-face-period-blood-14066332

To check out the important work and message of Days for Girls:
https://www.daysforgirls.org

Follow me on:

twitter: @theother_95
Instagram: @theother95
Facebook: @theother95page

Email me: theotherninetyfive@gmail.com
